alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 4:12PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Teton, southeastern Blaine, southeastern Fremont, southeastern Jefferson, northwestern Bannock, southeastern Butte, southeastern Lincoln, northwestern Power, northwestern Bonneville, Madison, Bingham and central Minidoka Counties through 545 PM MST... At 412 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Atomic City to 21 miles south of Southwest Inl to 13 miles northwest of Minidoka. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Blackfoot, Rigby, Felt, Ririe Reservoir, Lorenzo, Goshen, eastern American Falls Reservoir, Ammon, Shelley, Aberdeen, Iona, Ucon, Menan, Ririe, Roberts, Firth, Lewisville and Atomic City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Shoshone, Lava Beds
